mapper.update: update product set productnum =#{productnum}, productname =#{productname} ,productkind =#{productkind} ,productprice =#{productprice},productcontent =#{productcontent},productimage =#{productimage},productsales =#{productsalse} where productname = #{productname}

select.if: select * from(SELECT * FROM PRODUCT where productkind like #{productkind} ORDER BY PRODUCTSALES DESC) product where rownum <= 3
select * from(SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCTSALES DESC) product where rownum <= 20

mapper.select: select productnum, productname, productkind, productprice, productcontent, productimage, productsales from product where productnum = #{productnum}

select productnum, productname, productkind, productprice, productcontent,productimage, productsales from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(product,pk_product)*/ rownum rn, productnum, productname, productkind, productprice,productcontent, productimage, productsales from product where productkind like #{productkind} and rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} ) where rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum} order by productnum asc
select count(productnum) from product where productkind=#{productkind}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cartNum, id, productnum, cartStock) values (tbl_cart_seq.nextval, #{id} ,#{productnum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.id, c.productnum, c.cartStock, g.productname, g.productprice, g.productkind, g.productimage from tbl_cart c inner join product g on c.productnum = g.productnum where c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into shoporder (ordernum, id , payname , orderdate ) values (#{ordernum},#{id}, #{payname} ,sysdate)
insert into ORDERDETAIL (ordernum, productnum, ordercount, orderprice) values (#{ordernum}, #{productnum} ,#{ordercount}, #{orderprice})
mapper.select: select distinct productnum, productname, productkind, productprice, productcontent,productimage, productsales from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(product,pk_product)*/ rownum rn, productnum, productname, productkind, productprice,productcontent, productimage, productsales from product where productname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or productcontent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} ) where rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum} order by productnum asc
select count(productnum) from product where productname like '%'|| #{keyword}||'%' or productcontent like '%'|| #{keyword}||'%'
